episodes.title: Martial Arts Cults: How to Spot the Warning Signs
episodes.description:
Not all martial arts schools are created equal. In this video, I dive into the disturbing world of martial arts cults and the warning signs you should watch out for. From manipulative instructors to toxic environments, these cult-like practices can be dangerous for students both mentally and physically. If you're training or considering joining a martial arts school, this video will help you recognize the red flags and avoid falling into a harmful school.

Stay informed, protect yourself, and make sure your martial arts journey is a healthy one!
